headline: L3Harris Awards CPI Aerostructures, Inc. Contract for Next Generation Jammer Low-Band Program
summary: CPI to deliver Pod Structures to support airworthiness and design verificationEDGEWOOD, N.Y., Dec. 11, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CPI Aerostructures, Inc. (“CPI Aero®” or the “Company”) (NYSE American: CVU), a leading manufacturer of structural assemblies in both the commercial and military defense aerospace markets, announced today that it was awarded by L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) a contract not-to-exceed $12.1 million to deliver airborne pod structures.
